an5.95:4.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant who has five things will soon penetrate the unshakable.
an5.95:4.3: It’s when a mendicant has attained the textual analysis of meaning, text, terminology, and eloquence, and they review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
an5.95:4.4: A mendicant who has these five things will soon penetrate the unshakable.”
